articles.description:
Literal pvp… can’t get more degen than this

McKenna: There's an on-chain game of russian roulette where people are betting $10k per round.
If you lose you lose everything. 90% of your stake goes to other players and 10% is burnt/rev share.
The Telegram is absolutely wild.
